description:
It was discovered that jq did not perform sufficient bounds checking,
resulting in unbounded resource consumption. An attacker could use this
vulnerability to cause a denial of service.

jq.description: lightweight and flexible command-line JSON processor
lightweight and flexible command-line JSON processor

title: jq vulnerability
action: In general, a standard system update will make all the necessary changes.
isummary:
jq could be made to crash if it received specially crafted
input.
